value:
It has gotten a little warmer, hasn't
it? We are at war, I know...but you
must take a break sometime.

I have never really had the chance to
pause and enjoy the changing of the
seasons before...$k$pSpring really is lovely, isn't it?

How about some training? I know the
spring festival is exciting, but we can't
get carried away.

You'll see a lot of rabbits at the spring
festival. They represent prosperity
and fertility.$k$pI hear that some visitors even wish
on them, hoping to be blessed with a
child that's healthy and happy.

Now that it's getting warmer, it might
be a good time to scrub down the
pegasi. I'm sure they'd enjoy it.

I bring $Nf's
greetings. That's not why I'm
dressed like this, though.

Spring brings growth. Something
good is on its way...
The breeze is gentle and warm...

Spring may be on its way, but it
isn't here quite yet.

This is a fresh start, like the first
day of spring. I will do my best.

I'm Catria of the Whitewings. These
clothes... They're part of my mission.
Just...try to forget about them.

Stopping to enjoy a spring festival...
It's a little bit hard for me to wrap my
head around, frankly.$k$pThe thought would never have
crossed my mind before. I was too
busy fighting for my life...$k$pThen again, perhaps the struggles we
went through give meaning to our
celebrations today.$k$pOh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to take the
conversation down such a serious
path. I can't help but speak my mind...$k$pReally, I should just drop everything
and enjoy myself for now. But that's
not a thing I really know how to do.$k$pMaybe you can help me figure it out—
help me figure out how to change.$k$pWhen I'm with you, I feel like I can get
a glimpse into what it might be like...to
live a different life.$k$pThank you,
$Nu.
えいっ！
Spring!
きゃああっ！
My clothes!
Spring is here!
For the cause!
It's not the outfit!
Fear the rabbit!
Don't bury me in this...
ふふふ
I'm Catria of the Whitewings. Please don't ask why I'm dressed like this.
Hey! What did you do that for? Oh, my ears were crooked...
I wonder what my sisters would say if they saw me dressed like this.
How did I end up in this outfit? This is not great.
I look good dressed like this? You're just saying that...
Hoppity-hop! Is that really what rabbits say?
My desire to protect you is no laughing matter! Unlike this outfit...
Here we go!
What should I do?
For spring!
